sentences.en: But all they had added was the trappings and panoply of applied science.
sentences.cn: 但是他们所增添的一切,不过是实用科学的装饰和甲胄罢了.

sentences.en: Description: The Yixian formation of China contains a panoply of exquisitely - preserved insects, vertebrates, and plants.
sentences.cn: 描述: 中国的义县组产出的化石种类精美绝伦,种类繁多,昆虫 、 脊椎动物, 还有植物.

sentences.en: How could you possibly match wine to such a panoply of competing and powerful flavours?
sentences.cn: 你该如何尽你所能为这一桌风格如此浓重也如此冲突的丰盛美味搭配葡萄酒 呢 ?

sentences.en: The lakes were surrounded By a panoply of mountains.
sentences.cn: 群湖为壮丽的群山所环抱.

sentences.en: They were enriched with the wisdom of God and girded with the panoply of heaven.
sentences.cn: 他们因上帝的智慧而富足,以天上的甲胄为配备.他们原是耶和华的执事.

words.tran_cn: 装饰漂亮的；全套披甲的
为…提供全副装备（panoply的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 全套礼服，盛装，全副甲胄，雄伟的阵式
